title: Ap scaling basic attacks on Ap champs
body: Not sure if this is already a thing. But I find it a little unfair for ap champs when facing ad as ad champs have higher ad and their abilitys tend to scale of ad. Where as ap champs have ap scaling abilitys but nothing to boost basic attacks. I know this would be hard to incorporate and might just be stupid. Just food for thought. This would require a teemo rework

replies.body:
This is very stupid. If auto-attacks scale of AP then it wont be any different to AD. Might as well just remove AP from the game and make all champions AD.

AP champions have weak auto-attacks but better ability scaling than AD champions. They do deal more auto-attack damage with AP BTW, but only against turrets. If it was any other way, AP would be extremely broken.
I completely agree with telecasterdude who the heck came up with this stupid idea!
Agreed, plus ap champs tend to be ranged rather than melee.
ranged? ap champs tend to be ability driven is what you meant right.
No shit. Their auto attacks are also usually ranged auto attacks. You understand that, right?

Ummmm but then that would make AP and AD EXACTLY THE SAME when you think about it....

EDIT: ok basically exactly what Telecasterdude said.:P

There used to be an AP scaling mastery for Auto attacks but that was removed pre-season 6.

Buy a nashor's though if you want scaling for your auto's that badly.
